quotes.text: Training gives us an outlet for suppressed energies created by stress and thus tones the spirit just as exercise conditions the body.
Mental problems feed on the attention that you give them. The more you worry about them, the stronger they become. If you ignore them, they lose their power and finally vanish.

I always tell myself "the bad times never last". It will end. The good days are just around the corner.' Knowing there is always an end to the down moods always helps me to get through that day/week/month.
Don't worry about what you can't control. Our focus and energy needs to be on the things we can control. Attitude, effort, focus - these are the things we can control.
A man too busy to take care of his health is like a mechanic too busy to take care of his tools.
Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
Find joy in everything you choose to do. Every job, relationship, home… It's your responsibility to love it, or change it.
The natural healing force in each one of us is the greatest force in getting well.
When admiring other people's gardens, don't forget to tend to your own flowers.
I'm going to do what I want to do. I'm going to be who I really am. And I'm going to figure out what that is.
Hardship is a blessing when it spurs effort and development; ease is a curse when it increases complacency and self-indulgence.
I learned long ago to focus on things you can control and don't even pay attention to things you don't.
There are friendships imprinted in our hearts that will never be diminished by time and distance.

Start living in discomfort. Gradually increase it little by little, and you will steadily grow. If you want sudden growth, deluge yourself in great discomfort and do not retreat from it. The more discomfort you are willing to bear, the more you can grow.
You can't do anything as long as you are afraid of what might happen. No matter what the problem is, we must muster up the courage to face it.
Vision creates faith and faith creates willpower. With faith there is no anxiety and no doubt - just absolute confidence in yourself.
You, and only you, are ultimately responsible for who you become and how happy you are.
You learn far more from negative leadership than from positive leadership. Because you learn how not to do it. And, therefore, you learn how to do it.

Always do your best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.

Like success, failure is many things to many people. With a positive attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
I think anything is possible if you have the mindset and the will and desire to do it and put the time in.
Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life.
You must not under any pretense allow your mind to dwell on any thought that is not positive, constructive, optimistic, kind.
If things aren't going so well, I try to stay positive and not give in to negative thoughts.
Instead of hating, I have chosen to forgive and spend all of my positive energy on changing the world.
I think a lot of times we don't pay enough attention to people with a positive attitude because we assume they are naive or stupid or unschooled.
A sense of blessedness comes from a change of heart, not from more blessings.
I believe that you should gravitate to people who are doing productive and positive things with their lives.
Surrender to what is, let go of what was, have faith in what will be.
I've learned that positive thinking and encouragement are essential for leadership and progress.
There are powers inside of you which, if you could discover and use, would make of you everything you ever dreamed or imagined you could become.
Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
Go into the world and do well. But more importantly, go into the world and do good.
Instead of looking at the hundred reasons to quit, look at the thousand reasons not to give up.
Do not make your goal to be the best. Best is a label. It's something someone else decides for you. 'Better' is more personal.
The greatest lesson that I learned in all of this is that you have to start. Start now, start here, start small and keep it simple.
The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
The best way to create a better future is to do your best at this very moment.
Don't be afraid of your fears. They're not there to scare you. They're there to let you know that something is worth it.

I'm here to tell you that if you get broken, it's possible to put yourself back together. I'm here to tell you that if you get lost, it's possible that a light will come, dancing, on the horizon, to lead you home.
Anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.
Both good and bad days should end with productivity. Your mood affairs should never influence your work.
Life is short, and if we enjoy every moment of every day, then we will be happy no matter what happens or what changes along the way.
True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
The point is to be in the moment, not miss the moment while trying to capture it.
Remember to do everything with an abundance of love, so that one day you will remember the beauty of every moment lived.
They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
To be true to yourself, you must risk being disliked by others for not living up to their expectation of you.
Real leadership is leaders recognizing that they serve the people that they lead.
To be able to move on, one has to learn to forgive not only the person (or people) who have done one wrong but also oneself.
The more you are positive and say, 'I want to have a good life,' the more you build that reality for yourself by creating the life that you want.
Having the positive belief that it will all be O.K. just means that you hustle and make it work because failure is not even an option in your own mind.

Keep on beginning and failing. Each time you fail, start all over again, and you will grow stronger until you have accomplished a purpose - not the one you began with perhaps, but one you'll be glad to remember.
Nothing you become will disappoint me; I have no preconception that I'd like to see you be or do. I have no desire to forsee you, only to discover you. You can't disappoint me.

Let go of certainty. The opposite isn't uncertainty. It's openness, curiosity and a willingness to embrace paradox, rather than choose up sides. The ultimate challenge is to accept ourselves exactly as we are, but never stop trying to learn and grow.
Crying does not indicate that you are weak. Since birth, it has always been a sign that you are alive.
Growth means change and change involves risk, stepping from the known to the unknown.
By thinking about your goals every morning, many times during the day, and every night, you begin moving toward it and bringing it toward you.
There is enormous power in nailing your morning routine, but there's even more power in adapting to it when it doesn't happen as we'd like.
Decide carefully, exactly what you want in life, then work like mad to make sure you get it.
Personal growth is not a matter of learning new information but unlearning old limits.
In a growth mindset, challenges are exciting rather than threatening. So rather than thinking, oh, I'm going to reveal my weaknesses, you say, wow, here's a chance to grow.
When I feel lost and can't make a decision, I just stop and get quiet. I take a time-out.
Love should never cost you your peace. It should never cost you your joy. It should never cost you your happiness.
Growth is simply learning how to suffer gracefully, elegantly and not letting your pain completely tear you apart.
A man who believes in freedom will do anything under the sun to acquire, or preserve his freedom.
Climb the mountain not to plant your flag, but to embrace the challenge, enjoy the air and behold the view. Climb it so you can see the world, not so the world can see you.
Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
Recognizing that you are not where you want to be is a starting point to begin changing your life.
Life is changing all the time and if we fail to change with it we get left behind.
The tragedy of life is not that it ends so soon, but that we wait so long to begin it.
The journey isn't about becoming a different person. It's about loving who you are right now.
Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome.

Life seems sometimes like nothing more than a series of losses, from beginning to end. That's the given. How you respond to those losses, what you make of what's left, that's the part you have to make up as you go.
We need to get rid of the fear and guilt we might have for asserting ourselves. It serves no purpose except to keep us down.
Once you start practicing being grateful and thankful for things, people, and events, you may notice that you start to attract more positive things, people, and events in your life.
Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.

If we read the stories of the great spiritual teachers of the past, we find that they have attained spiritual realization through a great deal of meditation, solitude and practice. They did not take any shortcuts.
Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
There are two kinds of guilt: the kind that drowns you until you're useless, and the kind that fires your soul to purpose.
Do one thing at a time, and while doing it put your whole soul into it to the exclusion of all else.
They laugh at me because I'm different; I laugh at them because they're all the same.
Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
First principle: never to let one's self be beaten down by persons or by events.
Believe it can be done. When you believe something can be done, really believe, your mind will find the ways to do it. Believing a solution paves the way to the solution.
To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
It's all about falling in love with yourself and sharing that love with someone who appreciates you, rather than looking for love to compensate for a self-love deficit.
Self-worth is so vital to your happiness if you don't feel good about you, it's hard to feel good about anything else.
Surround yourself with the dreamers, and the doers, the believers, and thinkers, but most of all, surround yourself with those who see the greatness within you, even when you don't see it yourself.
I don't think people realize how much strength it takes to pull your own self out of a poisonous situation with someone you love deeply. So if you've done that today or any day, I'm proud of you.
You need time to think, time to dream, time to talk and time to do nothing at all.

Do not be scared to say "I love you" to yourself. Stand in front of the mirror and look at yourself and say to yourself as loudly as you can "I love you. I respect you for what you have faced in life. And I love you for what you have become."
Be the hardest working person you can be. That's how you separate yourself from the competition.
If you do not respect your own wishes, no one else will. You will simply attract people who disrespect you as much as you do.

If you want to be happy, learn to be alone without being lonely. Learn that being alone does not mean being unhappy. The world is full of plenty of interesting and enjoyable things to do and people who can enrich your life.
You got this. One day at a time. You are resilient, courageous, and capable. Be proud of yourself. It isn't easy enduring depression/anxiety.
Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
It is not easy to be a person of high standards; you have to pay for it. It does, however, make you stand out from the crowd, which alone makes it worth more than its price.
When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
A man who fears suffering is already suffering from what he fears.
Affirmations are a powerful tool to deliberately install desired beliefs about yourself.
By recording your dreams and goals on paper, you set in motion the process of becoming the person you most want to be. Put your future in good hands - your own.
Never do tomorrow what you can do today. Procrastination is the thief of time.
If you continue to think the way you've always thought, you'll continue to get what you've always got.
If the wounds on her heart and the bruises on her soul were translated on her skin, you wouldn't recognize her at all.
The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be.
When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you will be successful.
Don't wait for your feelings to change to take the action. Take the action and your feelings will change.
Perhaps all anxiety might derive from a fixation on moments — an inability to accept life as ongoing.

Most of us have had regrets and recognize how they can hold us back or keep us stuck in life and relationships. Getting past "the Past" is important for anyone desiring to live beyond mistakes and the problems they make.
Every sunset is an opportunity to reset. Every sunrise begins with new eyes.
Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
The world does not need a war against 'terrorism', it needs a culture of peace based on human rights for all.
Never be afraid to laugh at yourself. After all, you could be missing out on the joke of the century.
Own your truth and tell your story. It's time to embrace your unique soul signature.
Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
The secret to permanently breaking any bad habit is to love something greater than the habit.

You can spend minutes, hours, days, weeks, and months overthinking the past. Trying to put together pieces, imagining what could've been, should've been, or would've been. Or you can pick up the pieces off the floor and move on as a stronger, smarter person.
Don't believe every worried thought you have. Worried thoughts are notoriously inaccurate.
You get peace of mind not by thinking about it or imagining it, but by quietening and relaxing the restless mind.
When we miss someone, often, what we really miss is the part of us that with this someone awakens.
You don't have to be positive all the time. It's perfectly okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, frustrated, scared and anxious. Having feelings doesn't make you a negative person. It makes you human.
I don't want to waste anyone's time or money. I want to give people some truth and positive heart lift.

Nothing has ever gotten in my way. They said, well, you're a girl, you can't do that. I said, guess what, doesn't matter what you are. You can still do it if you want to do it and I like to do things that nobody has ever done.
I'm not telling you it is going to be easy, I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.
We do not stop exercising because we grow old – we grow old because we stop exercising.
You can't control the world, but when you control your thoughts, you bring order.
My dark days made me strong. Or maybe I already was strong, and they made me prove it.

Forgive the past. It is over. Learn from it and let go. People are constantly changing and growing. Do not cling to a limited, disconnected, negative image of a person in the past. See that person now. Your relationship is always alive and changing.
I do believe we're all connected. I do believe in positive energy. I do believe in the power of prayer. I do believe in putting good out into the world. And I believe in taking care of each other.
You are blessed, you are amazing, you are wonderful, you are special, you are unique, you are talented, you are gifted, and you are loved.
Positive thinking is a valuable tool that can help you overcome obstacles, deal with pain, and reach new goals.
We are dying from overthinking. We are slowly killing ourselves by thinking about everything. Think. Think. Think. You can never trust the human mind anyway. It's a death trap.

Overthinking is parasitic. It's viral. It's deadly, even. Letting yourself fall victim to overthinking doesn't just kill your happiness, it destroys who you are. The mind is a beautiful and complex thing, and the only person who can hurt it is yourself.
I want the peace in knowing that it wasn't for lack of hustling that I missed a target for my dream. I want to know that the one thing in my control was under control.
I did not ask for the things that I've been through, and I certainly did not ask my mind to paint and repaint the pictures in flashback form.
You find peace not by rearranging the circumstances of your life, but by realizing who you are at the deepest level.
Don't overthink things. Sometimes you can convince your head not to listen to your heart. Those are the decisions you regret for the rest of your life.
Don't let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.
The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character-that is the goal of true education.
When we long for life without difficulties, remind us that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.
Too many people spend money they haven't earned, to buy things they don't want, to impress people that they don't like.
When you're good at something, you'll tell everyone. When you're great at something, they'll tell you.
You have the most amazing valuable product on planet earth, which is the human body and which can reflect superconsciousness. You weren't born just to pay bills and die.
I may not be where I want to be but I'm thankful for not being where I used to be.
Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
You have to stop worrying about whether people like you. Some people don't even like themselves.
As you remove toxic people from your life, you free up space and emotional energy for positive, healthy relationships.

If you find someone who makes you smile, who checks up on you often to see if you're okay, who watches out for you and wants the best for you, who loves and respects you, don't let them go. People like that are hard to find.
We leave something of ourselves behind when we leave a place, we stay there, even though we go away. And there are things in us that we can find again only by going back there.

Sometimes beautiful things come into our lives out of nowhere. We can't always understand them, but we have to trust in them. I know you want to question everything, but sometimes it pays to just have a little faith.
The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance; the wise grows it under his feet.
Enjoy today. It is one of the "good old days" you will miss in the future.
The most interesting people you'll find are ones that don't fit into your average cardboard box. They'll make what they need, they'll make their own boxes.
Until you let go of all the toxic people in your life, you will never be able to grow into your fullest potential. Let them go so you can grow.
Viruses are contagious but so is fear, hysteria, calm, love, enthusiasm, kindness and joy. Choose wisely.

Gratitude means to recognize the good in your life, be thankful for whatever you have, some people may not even have one of those things you consider precious to you (love, family, friends etc). Each day give thanks for the gift of life. You are blessed.
Forget past mistakes. Forget failures. Forget about everything except what you're going to do now - and do it.
At the end of the day, we must go forward with hope and not backward by fear and division.
I truly believe in positive synergy, that your positive mindset gives you a more hopeful outlook, and belief that you can do something great means you will do something great.
Never be in a hurry; do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.
If you concentrate on finding whatever is good in every situation, you will discover that your life will suddenly be filled with gratitude, a feeling that nurtures the soul.
There is no limit to the power of the human mind. The more concentrated it is, the more power is brought to bear on one point.
Just believe in yourself. Even if you don't, pretend that you do and, at some point, you will.
Courage means being able to do something new. It also means taking steps to "be" someone new.
Always be thankful for the little things... Even the smallest mountains can hide the most breathtaking views.
What is rare is not raw talent, skill, or even confidence, but humility, diligence, and self-awareness.
Our real blessings often appear to us in the shape of pains, losses and disappointments; but let us have patience and we soon shall see them in their proper figures.

It always gets worse before it can get better. But it will get better. Like everything else, and like our past struggles, at some point we win, but before that win, there's always that loss that spurs us on.
Focus your mind on all the wonderful things in your life – you truly are blessed.
Our souls are not hungry for fame, comfort, wealth, or power. Our souls are hungry for meaning, for the sense that we have figured out how to live so that our lives matter.
Learn to get in touch with the silence within yourself and know that everything in this life has a purpose. There are no mistakes, no coincidences. All events are blessings given to us to learn from.
Never stop fighting no matter what anyone says. If it's in your gut, your soul, there's nothing, no worldly possession that should come between you and your expression.
Examine the energy you are sending into the world. Is it positive, loving and hopeful or is it negative, hostile and angry?
Remember that reading these quotes will not change your life. These quotes only work to push you in the right direction. You are the only one who can change you.
Don't sit still; start moving now. In the beginning, you may not go in the direction you want, but as long as you are moving, you are creating alternatives and possibilities.
You only can get out of our challenges by changing yourself. Change comes from within... a greater passion, a greater commitment, and a greater life. you can begin today.
You come to love not by finding the perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
When you depersonalize abrasive behavior and see it as a call for help you become a catalyst for the best kind of change.
When sadness knows the reason of tears, heart prepares to carry the ache for years.
Our Positivity repels the external negative energy and attract the positive energy.
It's how you deal with failure that determines how you achieve success.

If you can be continuously aware of each thought as it rises, and if you can be so indifferent to it that it doesn't sprout or flourish, you are well on the way to escaping from the entanglements of mind.
They that pursue their dreams unrelentingly with tenacity and the right attitude never continue to live with dreams forever. They live their dreams and realize their aspirations.
Self-discipline is the ability to make yourself do what you should do, when you should do it, whether you feel like it or not.
You current situation is giving you an opportunity to re-evaluate what you want.
Real difficulties can be overcome; it is only the imaginary ones that are unconquerable.
Integrity, undivided loyalty, love. The pure in heart have a special blessing. Because there is no limit to how good life can become.
Discipline yourself to do the things you need to do when you need to do them, and the day will come when you will be able to do the things you want to do when you want to do them.
Don't follow the path. Go where there is no path and begin the trail. When you start a new trail equipped with courage, strength and conviction, the only thing that can stop you is you!
Darlin' you don't need all that armor. Because what lives inside, they can't break.
If your dream ain't bigger than you, there's a problem with your dream.
You are self employed. You work to pay your bills, build your dreams and create your life, regardless of who signs your paycheck.
I will breathe. I will think of solutions. I will not let my worry control me. I will not let my stress level break me. I will simply breathe. And it will be okay.
Keep your mindset strong, your heart pure, your intentions kind and your dreams big.
You can't 'fit yourself in' to greatness. This can only be done by embracing and pursuing your biggest dreams and desires.
The ego gets what it wants with words. The soul finds what it needs in silence.
It's better to dare to dream big and achieve half of your dreams than to dream small dreams and achieve all.
A life can change in a tenth of a second. Or sometimes it can take 70 years.
Just learn from your mistakes.. and forgive yourself.. and better yourself.
If they talk about other people with you, they will talk about you with other people.
Unease, anxiety, tension, stress, worry - all forms of fear - are caused by too much future, and not enough presence.
A person tied to the world of sorrows can return to nature for inspiration. Nature provides solace to troubled hearts.
Calmness is a human superpower. The ability to not overreact or take things personally keeps your mind clear and your heart at peace.
Stress is not created by the events in your life, but by your reaction to them.
Look forward to the future and look forward to the unknown. Nothing stays the same and people change. One day that hurt and pain will be a distant memory.
The speed of your success is limited only by your dedication and what you're willing to sacrifice.
What brings us to tears, will lead us to grace. Our pain is never wasted.
Remember: we don't control what happens, we control how we respond.

Accept - then act. Whatever the present moment contains, accept it as if you had chosen it. Always work with it, not against it. Make it your friend and ally, not your enemy. This will miraculously transform your whole life.
If you keep doing what you have always done, your life will never change. Change your routine.
Your strength is in your calmness, in the clarity of your mind. Strength comes from putting the negative aside without reacting. Win in calmness, in consciousness, in balance.
